ModMetaData.name: Fungus Diet Filter
ModMetaData.author: llunak
ModMetaData.description:
This mod provides filter "Allow food with fungus", similarly to the already existing filters like "Allow vegetarian food", where fungus is missing as a special category.
The filter for vegetarian food is altered so that it no longer includes fungus food. This allows setting up food restrictions for colonies where some (but not all) pawns want fungus.
Food filters do not show in storage, which makes it difficult to have separate cooking bills for different diets. For that, see the "Diet Filters In Storage" mod.
GitHub: https://github.com/llunak/rimworld-fungusdietfilter
